Name: Super Monk War Z
About the game: The main character Denim who belongs to the anti-devil organization 'Sword of the Buddha' It will go to subjugation by the order from the organization. Where denim goes, the place where I once trained It was a Yukumo temple in the Nanaside region. 'Super Monk War Z' is a 2D horizontal shooting game consisting of 4 stages . 3 types of formation and each characteristic shot can be used Also, the shots will change from the placement of options depending on the formation. You can increase your options by digesting your score.
